item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, November 22, 2024 at 6:20 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Phased Array Microphone (2023) (112 points | 25 comments)
2. Show HN: A Marble Madness-inspired WebGL game we built for Netlify (265 points | 139 comments)
3. Amazon to invest another $4B in Anthropic, OpenAI's biggest rival (142 points | 71 comments)
4. The Deceptively Asymmetric Unit Sphere (25 points | 2 comments)
5. Show HN: Rebels in the sky – Terminal game about space pirates (98 points | 32 comments)
6. Salmon return to lay eggs in historic habitat after dam removal project (198 points | 138 comments)
7. FaSTer: Atari ST Digital Magazine (60 points | 13 comments)
8. From string to AST: parsing (2019) (66 points | 15 comments)
9. Wasp (YC W21) is hiring a framework engineer to build Laravel for JavaScript ( | hide)
10. Prince Nico Mbarga’s biggest hit outsold any of The Beatles’ (2017) (35 points | 32 comments)
11. A “meta-optics” camera that is the size of a grain of salt (162 points | 98 comments)
12. Show HN: Llama 3.2 Interpretability with Sparse Autoencoders (493 points | 69 comments)
13. Autoflow, a Graph RAG based and conversational knowledge base tool (180 points | 28 comments)
14. A C++ Mixin System (41 points | 18 comments)
15. OK, I can partly explain the LLM chess weirdness now (360 points | 309 comments)
16. NeuralDEM – Real-Time Simulation of Industrial Particulate Flows (46 points | 9 comments)
17. Key Transparency and the Right to Be Forgotten (43 points | 28 comments)
18. Bayesian Neural Networks (212 points | 36 comments)
19. What's Next for WebGPU (163 points | 151 comments)
20. Private School Labeler on Bluesky (14 points | discuss)
21. Show HN: OnePageGA – Simple dashboard for GA4 like Plausible (20 points | 17 comments)
22. What Made Dostoevsky's Work Immortal (69 points | 84 comments)
23. The FORTH code for Chipwits is released in the game's 40th anniversary (212 points | 57 comments)
24. Mechanically strong yet metabolizable plastic breaks down in seawater (101 points | 57 comments)
25. The meme-ification of the “Demon Core” (348 points | 255 comments)
26. Java 24 to Reduce Object Header Size and Save Memory (18 points | 10 comments)
27. Machiavelli and the Emergence of the Private Study (85 points | 19 comments)
28. Growing Music: musical interpretations of L-Systems [pdf] (2005) (30 points | 8 comments)
29. WhisperNER: Unified Open Named Entity and Speech Recognition (105 points | 14 comments)
30. The Surprising Social Lives of Pythons (7 points | 4 comments)
